text: Crimes of Passion is a 1984 American erotic thriller movie directed by Ken Russell and starring Kathleen Turner, Anthony Perkins, John Laughlin, Annie Potts, Bruce Davison, Rick Wakeman. It was distributed by New World Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1984 thriller movies Category:1980s erotic movies Category:American erotic movies Category:American thriller movies Category:Movies directed by Ken Russell Category:Movies set in Los Angeles
title: Crimes of Passion (1984 movie)
